frontmatter.title: Kubernetes UI Server
frontmatter.subtitle: Collaborative and visual infrastructure as design for Kubernetes UI Server
frontmatter.howItWorksDetails: Collaboratively manage infrastructure with your coworkers synchronously sharing the same designs.
featureList: WhoAmI service returns the user info of the user making the api call.
PodView resource exposes actual resource usage by a Pod. The resource usage information is read from Prometheus.
Identity Server is a Kubernetes extended apiserver (EAS). As an EAS, it has access to the user who is making an api call to the whoami server.
